What do they make

Hand and body moisturising bars and soaps.

Visit Lolo Body Care

Why Less Mess recommends

We're only recommending Lolo Body Care's hand and body bars in tins, and their body soaps. The bars are fantastic, refillable moisturisers in a really huge range of scents to suit anyone. Sadly, many of Lolo's other products are plastic bound, so avoid those.

We're a work in progress

This site doesn't take any fees or payment for recommendations, it's simply a list of products and services we know work well for normal people who just want to make Less Mess in the world.
